title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.10 - Unlawful assembly
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1151.10 - Unlawful assembly

State Regulations

No person shall assemble with four or more other persons at a
transportation facility for the purpose of engaging or preparing to engage with
them in tumultuous and violent conduct likely to cause public alarm, or when, being present at an assembly which either has or develops such purpose, he
remains there with intent to advance that purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1151.10

Amended, New

York State Register May 14, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 19, eff. 5/14/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
